description: Leader in construction and renovation in Quebec
description2: Bati Québec Inc. has been serving the greater Montreal area with high quality work for over 17 years. It is made up of a team of experts in home renovation and new construction. We are able to serve our customers efficiently and appropriately, analyze your needs and advise you throughout your project. You can count on Bâti Québec Inc., we are recognized for being your trusted contractor.
description3: If you need to carry out renovation work, one of our specialists can come to your home for a free estimate. Are you looking to make improvements, but running out of ideas or inspiration? You can count on us today. Contact us now and one of our experts will analyze your needs and you will receive, as soon as possible, a personalized and free design estimate.
description5: Our goal is to serve all our customers in a timely manner, ensuring we offer you services at an economical and affordable rate. We aim to achieve 100% customer satisfaction, continuing our legacy as an expert contractor with over 17 years of experience.
welcome: Welcome to the Bâti Québec Inc. website
descriptionEntreprise: We are a private company providing all phases of construction to our owner and future owner clients. We take care of your construction or renovation project from design to final inspection, turnkey project. All this is done with respect and professionalism. Whether it's renovating a small bathroom or building your dream home, you can count on Bâti Québec Inc.!
services3: We specialize in owner-occupied projects, ensuring minimal disruption to your daily life while maintaining the highest quality standards.
services5: From foundation to finishing touches, we bring your dream home to life with expert craftsmanship and attention to detail.
services7: Whether upgrading a single room or a complete home renovation, we provide seamless, high-quality remodeling services tailored to your needs.
qualifications11: 4.2 Non-structural masonry work marble and ceramic
qualifications15: 7 Insulation waterproofing roofs and exterior cladding
